rows.label: tlk70000009_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Laura-sama! Thank you so
much for your help before.
It really means a lot

rows.label: tlk70000009_04_msg0002
rows.name:
If you hadn't have set me straight, I
bet I'd still be putting my pride before
the things that are really important.

rows.label: tlk70000009_04_msg0003
rows.name:
I know they say that actions
speak louder than words...

rows.label: tlk70000009_04_msg0004
rows.name:
But sometimes words are exactly what
you need. I can't keep expecting the
people around me to read my mind.

rows.label: tlk70000009_04_msg0005
rows.name:
If there's something I need to say to my
brother, I'm just going to say it straight.
It'll be good for our relationship.

rows.label: tlk70000009_04_msg0006
rows.name: I mean...I've only got one big brother.
